articles.title: Tanitoluwa started playing chess less than two years ago - BBC Sport
Summary: He moved with his family to the United States, but is currently living in a homeless shelter with his mother Oluwatoyin, father Kayode and older brother
He has been playing for just over a year, but hours of practice and hard work have paid off - he has just won top prize in his age category at the New York State Chess Championship
Tanitoluwa and his family spoke to Newsday's Alan Kasujja about his win
(Photo: Tanitoluwa Adewumi playing chess
Credit: Oluwatoyin Adewumi)
articles.description: Tanitoluwa started playing chess less than two years ago

articles.content: Tanitoluwa Adewumi left his home in northern Nigeria with his family in 2017, because of the ongoing attacks by the Islamist militant group Boko Haram. He moved with his family to the United States, but is currently living in a homeless shelter with his mothe… [+509 chars]

articles.title: Warner Bros boss quits amid affair reports
Summary: Kevin acknowledges that his mistakes are inconsistent with the company's leadership expectations," Warner said
Investigation Mr Tsujihara had worked at Warner Bros for 25 years and had headed the studio since 2013
In a statement, Mr Stankey said: "It is in the best interest of WarnerMedia, Warner Bros, our employees and our partners for Kevin to step down as chairman and chief executive of Warner Bros
The company said that "it is working with a third party law firm to complete its investigation with Mr Tsujihara's cooperation"
WarnerMedia said it was yet to name a successor for Mr Tsujihara and declined to comment on a severance package
articles.description: Kevin Tsujihara leaves after claims he attempted to secure roles for an actress he was involved with.

articles.title: Trudeau loses top civil servant in crisis
Summary: He had faced calls for his resignation over claims he acted in a partisan manner during the SNC-Lavalin affair

The prime minister's former attorney general and justice minister, Jody Wilson-Raybould, has said she faced attempts at political interference from Mr Trudeau and his inner circle - including Mr Wernick - over whether to make a deal that would have suspended prosecution against SNC-Lavalin
The main role of the clerk of the privy council is to act as a link between the prime minister and cabinet and the public service
Liberal MP Jane Philpott quit cabinet earlier this month in protest with how the government has handled the matter
Ms Wilson-Raybould resigned from cabinet in February
articles.description: Michael Wernick says he will retire because 'mutual trust' has been broken with opposition parties.

 Top Canadian public servant Michael Wernick to resign

Summary: The French BEA accident authority did not detail the similarities, but media reports suggested they found similar flight angles before the crashes
It comes amid continuing questions over 737 Max's design and vetting to fly
"The 737-MAX certification program followed the FAA's standard certification process," it added

It is impossible to say how long that will take

articles.title: Speaker rules out Brexit vote on same motion
Summary: She said this makes it less likely the prime minister will ask EU leaders at a summit this week for a short extension - which Mrs May had said she would do if her deal got through Parliament

She said: "The conclusion that most people in Westminster would reach from that means that we're heading - it's likely - towards a closer relationship with the European Union, a softer Brexit than the one Theresa May has set out
Brexit minister Kwasi Kwarteng has confirmed Mrs May will be writing to European Council President Donald Tusk to ask to postpone the UK's exit date
He suggested "there were ways around this" - including potentially cutting short the current session of Parliament, a move which would lead to calls for a general election
articles.description: John Bercow says the motion MPs vote on must be different to the one that MPs rejected last week.
articles.content:
Image copyrightHOC
John Bercow has ruled out another vote on the government's previously rejected Brexit agreement if the motion remains "substantially the same".

articles.title: Beto O'Rourke campaign raises record $6.1m
Summary: Speaking to reporters on Saturday, Mr O'Rourke said he had no "large-dollar fundraisers planned" and was ruling out "taking any PAC [Political Action Committee] money or any lobbyist money ever"
The Texas Democrat still has no campaign manager, but US media report he is in talks with someone to take on the job
It remains to be seen whether Mr O'Rourke's pace can be sustained
US dollars raised on first day (in millions) Figures released by campaigns not confirmed by election officials--Ms Harris raised $1
Who will take on Trump in 2020? If Beto O'Rourke's campaign success continues, he may keep Donald Trump from being re-elected
articles.description: The Democratic rising star has broken the fundraising record previously held by Senator Bernie Sanders.
articles.content:

In his first day of campaigning as a presidential candidate, Texas Democrat Beto O'Rourke raised $6.1m (£4.6m), the largest of any 2020 candidate so far.

Utrecht University closed all its buildings and trains were not allowed to run into the city's central station
Some public transport services have now reopened

articles.title: Sam Smith: 'I'm not male or female'
Summary: He was speaking to actress Jameela Jamil about fame, body image and confidence
"I've always existed between the two genders

"Image copyright Jamie Windust Image caption Jamie says how they "present" tends to confuse people In his interview with Jameela Jamil, Sam Smith says he has dated men who identify as heterosexual and believes "you fall in love with people, not genitals"
"I am feminine in many ways and I've always resented that," he says
articles.description: The singer says realising he doesn't identify as either gender has improved his body confidence.
articles.content:

Sam Smith has come out as non-binary saying he feels "like a woman sometimes" and has considered having a sex change.

It also said it would send tents and thousands of shelter kits to Mozambique
But we are hearing that the situation outside the city could be even worse," a statement from the IFRC quotes him as saying

articles.title: US detects huge meteor explosion
Summary: 6km above the Earth's surface, with an impact energy of 173 kilotons
Dr Johnson said the fireball came in over an area not too far from routes used by commercial planes flying between North America and Asia
What's the significance? In 2005, Congress tasked Nasa with finding 90% of near-Earth asteroids of 140m (460ft) in size or larger by 2020
Fragments of the object were later found in the area
Dr Mainzer added: "But if you have an IR-based (infrared) telescope, it goes a lot faster
articles.description: The fireball is the second most powerful in 30 years and the biggest since one over Chelyabinsk in 2013.
